overview: Prasad 2 is a film about society, politics and relationships that starts with a couple who had an inter-caste love relationship and have returned to the village to face society with their 9-year-old son Prasad. As the country now has entered the Republic system, the constitution was written in favour of the people & caste untouchability was made a crime by the law. The story revolves around the future conflict of Baburam, Narayani, who returned to the village, the struggle for that and an ups and downs journey. For them, what is greater than love?
title: Prasad 2
